p: Reticulocyte haemoglobin content (CHr) (Siemens ADVIA 2120) is a diagnostic marker of iron deficiency in humans and dogs. RETIC‐HGB (IDEXX ProCyte Dx) is a new parameter for analysis of iron deficiency for veterinary use. Aim of this prospective study was to evaluate the clinical and diagnostic utility of RETIC‐HGB compared to CHr in the diagnosis of feline iron‐limited erythropoiesis (ILE).
